Alert Name: bush
Congress may push for fast-track trade extension
A limited extension could disrupt negotiators conclusion of the Doha round of trade talks.
04/17/07 03:52 PM, EDT
A senior U.S. Democratic lawmaker said Tuesday he believed Congress was ready to give the Bush administration a limited extension of fast-track trade negotiating authority to finish a round of world trade talks.
FULL STORY



Alert Name: bush
Democrats must decide on how far to push Bush on Iraq

04/17/07 03:26 PM, EDT
Congressional Democrats say there is no doubt President Bush will soon be confronted with legislation calling for an end to the Iraq war.
FULL STORY
